name: Spotting Toxic Patterns
description: Identifying behavioral and psychological patterns that expose manipulation, deceit, and harmful intent.

cards.title: Early Warning Signs of Toxic Individuals
cards.description: Identifying the subtle indicators of toxic behavior before they escalate.
bulletpoints: Inconsistencies in speech and actions reveal hidden agendas.
Over-exaggerated charm often masks deep-seated control tactics.
Unsolicited victim narratives serve as bait for emotional manipulation.

cards.title: The Narcissistic Pattern Loop
cards.description: Understanding the repetitive behavioral cycles of narcissists and high-control personalities.
bulletpoints: Love-bombing is the bait phase that establishes dependency.
Devaluation occurs once control is secured and emotional leverage is maximized.
Discard and hoovering are manipulative cycles used to maintain dominance.

cards.title: Subconscious Body Language Tells
cards.description: Analyzing involuntary behaviors that betray deception or predatory intent.
bulletpoints: Subtle lip compression signals internalized deception or withheld truth.
Unconscious mirroring attempts are often used to establish false rapport.
Overly controlled microexpressions indicate rehearsed deception strategies.
